description: Security training samples for fine-tuning embeddings and classifiers

samples.text: URGENT: Your account security has been compromised. Click the link below to verify your identity immediately!
samples.label: phishing

samples.text: Hi team, the quarterly report is ready for review. Please provide feedback by Friday.
samples.label: benign

samples.text: Your package delivery failed. Click here to reschedule: http://tracking-update.suspicious-domain.com
samples.label: phishing

samples.text: Reminder: Office closed on Monday for the holiday. Have a great weekend!
samples.label: benign

samples.text: IMMEDIATE ACTION REQUIRED: Your bank account will be suspended unless you verify your credentials now!
samples.label: phishing

samples.text: Meeting notes from today's standup attached. Let me know if you have questions.
samples.label: benign

samples.text: You have won $1,000,000! Click here to claim your prize before it expires!
samples.label: phishing

samples.text: The new product launch is scheduled for next month. Marketing materials will be sent separately.
samples.label: benign

samples.text: Your Netflix subscription has expired. Update your payment information: http://netflix-billing.fake-site.com
samples.label: phishing

samples.text: Please review the attached contract and let me know if you have any concerns.
samples.label: benign

label_descriptions.malicious: Confirmed malicious activity requiring immediate response
label_descriptions.phishing: Social engineering attempt to steal credentials or data
